SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ObservableView<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CLI extends View
The CLI class represents the Command-Line Interface (CLI) view in the application It extends the View class and provides methods for interacting with the user through the command line
